Title: Extends the authorization of the county of Tompkins to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the authorization of the county of Tompkins to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes until November 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the county of Tompkins to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
